tool_description: funky pixel avatars API gives user their avatars based on gender, username and it's also support multiple image type, you can generate png, jpeg, jpg and gif avatars.
name: funky pixel avatars
title: funky pixel avatars

api_list.name: Generate Avatar Based On Username
api_list.description: This API will generate the avatar based on username and will also return the avatar in request image format.

optional_parameters.name: fe
optional_parameters.description: It's not required and default value for image format is png

api_list.name: Generate Avatar
api_list.description: Generate avatar api get gender and image type from user and generates the avatar of given gender and image type.

optional_parameters.name: fe
optional_parameters.description: This query parameter can be blank, default image type is png
